name: Web Application
description: Responsive, modern and highly scalable web applications built with VueJS and Go running on Google Cloud.

name: Native Apps
description: Desktop or server applications and services for Windows or Linux.

name: Mobile Apps
description: Fast, reliable and intuitive applications for Android/iOS mobile built with Flutter.

name: Data Migration
description: Custom application to extract data from existing systems or storage to a new location.

name: Service Integration
description: Implementation of third party service integration to current system.

name: Automation
description: Automate manual processes to improve efficiency and reduce errors significantly.

name: Application Rewrite
description: Modernize legacy application by rebuilding it using the best of today's technologies.

name: Maintenance & Support
description: Codebase updates to improve software, fix bugs, or apply new features.
